---
title: 'How to control MSS'
---

Here the steps needed to connect to MSS system and to control it are described:

1. Connect to lac913 server 

2. Connect to MSS system using SSH 
   ```
   ssh -X cxrs@tmpnuc
    ```
    Password: 529.1nm
3. Open Matlab, go to /home/cxrs/MSS/Functions and run the control scripts 
   ```
   SpecControl_MSS(13)
   ```
    where 13 is the number of the spectrometer to be controlled. All the necessary functions will automatically run.
4. To control the camera parameters run
   ```
   generalSettingsUpdate.m
   ```
    go to the generated file Sys13 and change the parameters as needed. Save the file and run
5. If something as to be calibrated go to the folder /home/cxrs/MSS/Calibration and run the calibration scripts as needed.
